plan.task: Create a command-line interface that allows users to interact with the program
Implement inquirer to prompt users for input when creating tests, functions, and executing them
Implement bun to generate code for the tests and functions created
Integrate OpenAI API to generate functions based on user input
Write code to execute the generated functions and tests
Implement lodash-es to create AST functions that can traverse code and perform specific actions
Modify the program to accept file path arguments to customize the output or behavior
Implement zod to validate user input and ensure correctness
Integrate dayjs library for date and time manipulation if needed
Implement jest for unit testing the program
Write the main function that ties all the implemented functions and tools together
